import ReactDom from "react-dom/client"; import "./card.css" import "./style.css" const root = ReactDom.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')); function MovieCards({ mname, mrating, lastupdate, mreleasedatetime, mtime, mruntime, cardImg, adult }) { const adultMovie = adult=="18+" ? "adult-movie" : "non-adult-movie" return ( <>

{mname}

{mrating}

{adult}

{lastupdate}

{mreleasedatetime}

{mruntime}

{mtime}

) } root.render( <>
)
